message: If you like action checkout the series "24" from netfilx: Each season of this Emmy-winning action thriller follows 24 hours in the life of Jack Bauer (Kiefer Sutherland), a special agent who works for the government thwarting terrorist attacks, assassination attempts and other major threats to national security. Filmed in real time, the clock ticks down as Jack puts life and limb on the line defusing bombs, intercepting biological weapons and struggling with his own inner demons.
